TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit NamedPermissionSet extends System.Security.PermissionSet
Public NotInheritable Class NamedPermissionSet Inherits PermissionSet
public ref class NamedPermissionSet sealed : System::Security::PermissionSet

summary.span: 定義具有名稱和描述與其相關聯的權限集。

span.span: Defines a permission set that has a name and description associated with it.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 名為安全性原則管理中使用集合來指定要授與特定程式碼群組所屬的程式碼的權限的權限。Named permission sets are used in security policy administration to specify the permissions to be granted to code that belongs to certain code groups. 名稱是英數字元的字串。Names are strings of alphanumeric characters. 描述的字串可以包含任何可列印的字元。Description strings can consist of any printable characters. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示的成員使用類別。The following code example shows the use of members of the class.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Security.NamedPermissionSet permSet) cil managed

param.name: permSet
param.span: 設定用來建立新的執行個體的具名使用權限。

span.span: The named permission set from which to create the new instance.

summary.span: 初始化的新執行個體從另一個具名的使用權限集合的類別。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class from another named permission set.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string name) cil managed

param.name: name
param.span: 新的名稱命名的權限集。

span.span: The name for the new named permission set.

summary.span: 初始化空的新執行個體具有指定名稱的類別。

span.span: Initializes a new, empty instance of the class with the specified name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個建構函式會建立具名使用權限集合具有任何權限，但與使用權限狀態。Using this constructor creates a named permission set with no permissions but with an permission state. 在不受限制的狀態中設定的有效具名使用權限包含實作的所有權限介面。A named permission set in an unrestricted state effectively contains all permissions that implement the interface. 具名使用權限集合會包含所有內建權限，以及所有自訂使用者定義的權限實作。The named permission set will contain all built-in permissions as well as all custom user-defined permissions that implement . 所有的權限將會有相當於`Unrestricted`使用權限狀態。All permissions will have the equivalent of an `Unrestricted` permission state. 不會實作的權限會是空的執行個體。Permissions that do not implement will be empty instances.

span.span: The parameter is or is an empty string ("").

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string name, valuetype System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState state) cil managed
Public Sub New (name As String, state As PermissionState)

param.name: name
param.span: 新的名稱命名的權限集。

span.span: The name for the new named permission set.
One of the values.

summary.span: 初始化的新執行個體類別具有不受限制或完全限制的狀態中指定的名稱。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified name in either an unrestricted or a fully restricted state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在不受限制的狀態中設定的有效具名使用權限包含實作的所有權限介面。A named permission set in an unrestricted state effectively contains all permissions that implement the interface. 具名使用權限集合會包含所有內建權限，以及所有的自訂權限。The named permission set will contain all built-in permissions as well as all custom permissions. 所有的權限將會有`Unrestricted` 。All permissions will have an `Unrestricted`. 不會實作的權限，例如身分識別的權限，會是空的執行個體。Permissions that do not implement , such as identity permissions, will be empty instances.

span.span: The parameter is or is an empty string ("").

summary.span: 重新建構具有指定狀態的 XML 編碼方式的具名使用權限集合。

span.span: Reconstructs a named permission set with a specified state from an XML encoding.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會從先前所建立的 XML 項目集的具名使用權限狀態重新建立。This method recreates the state of a named permission set from an XML element previously created by . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用方法來重新建立物件。The following code example shows the use of the method to recreate a object. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class.

exception.span: 參數不是具名使用權限集合的有效表示法。

span.span: The parameter is not a valid representation of a named permission set.
The parameter is .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance int32 GetHashCode() cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetHashCode () As Integer

summary.span: 取得 物件的雜湊碼，其適合用於雜湊表這類的雜湊演算法和資料結構。

span.span: Gets a hash code for the object that is suitable for use in hashing algorithms and data structures such as a hash table.

returns.span: 目前 物件的雜湊碼。

span.span: A hash code for the current object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 兩個相同的權限執行個體的雜湊程式碼可能會不同，因此雜湊程式碼應該不會用來比較兩個物件。The hash code for two instances of the same permission might differ, hence a hash code should not be used to compare two objects.
